message: ...and I'll make it 15-minute increments instead of 30 minute.
idea: print out a little table that shows the time to start/stop working in 25-minute spurts for up to four sessions (Pomodoro)
that way, at most it will be in a few minutes.
30-minute will be the default. 15 will be for more advanced use
text of the even numbers will appear bigger than the text for the smaller numbers
times could also be anchored to the start
right now it would be: End 1:00 1:30 2:00 2:30. Start 25 minutes before each.
the longest to start 25-minutes would be at :06 or :56, and it would be start at :30 or :00 and break 5 minutes before the next start (:55 and :25)
I'm actually on the system now. Back in 5 minutes. :)
hmm...actually starting at :00, :15, :30, or :45 might be simpler than *either* starting or ending at :00 or :30. Yes, I think so.
going offline at 2:30, after 4 pomodoros. going to see how far I can make it.
Got hella distracted. Set up a tumblr blog and a facebook page. http://jsonista.tumblr.com/
